name: The Fool
meaning_upright: New beginnings, spontaneity, adventure, and a leap of faith.
meaning_reversed: Recklessness, naivety, and foolishness.

name: The Magician
meaning_upright: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power, and inspired action.
meaning_reversed: Manipulation, poor planning, and untapped talents.

name: The High Priestess
meaning_upright: Intuition, mystery, subconscious mind, and inner wisdom.
meaning_reversed: Secrets, disconnected from intuition, and withdrawal.

name: The Empress
meaning_reversed: Creative block, dependence on others, and limited resources.

name: The Emperor
meaning_reversed: Domination, excessive control, and rigidity.

name: The Hierophant
meaning_upright: Tradition, conformity, spiritual wisdom, and religious beliefs.
meaning_reversed: Rebellion, unconventional approach, and new methods.

name: The Lovers
meaning_reversed: Disharmony, imbalance, and misalignment of values.

name: The Chariot
meaning_reversed: Lack of control, aggression, and obstacles.

name: Strength
meaning_upright: Courage, bravery, confidence, and inner strength.
meaning_reversed: Self-doubt, weakness, and insecurity.

name: The Hermit
meaning_reversed: Isolation, loneliness, and withdrawal.

name: Wheel of Fortune
meaning_reversed: Bad luck, resistance to change, and unwelcome surprises.

name: Justice
meaning_upright: Fairness, truth, law, and cause and effect.
meaning_reversed: Injustice, dishonesty, and lack of accountability.

name: The Hanged Man
meaning_upright: Surrender, new perspectives, and letting go.
meaning_reversed: Resistance, stalling, and indecision.

name: Death
meaning_reversed: Resistance to change, personal transformation, and inner purging.

name: Temperance
meaning_reversed: Imbalance, excess, and lack of long-term vision.

name: The Devil
meaning_upright: Bondage, addiction, materialism, and shadow self.
meaning_reversed: Releasing limiting beliefs, detachment, and exploring dark thoughts.

name: The Tower
meaning_upright: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, and revelation.
meaning_reversed: Personal transformation, fear of change, and averting disaster.

name: The Star
meaning_reversed: Lack of faith, despair, and disconnection.

name: The Moon
meaning_upright: Illusion, fear, anxiety, and the subconscious.
meaning_reversed: Release of fear, unhappiness, and confusion.

name: The Sun
meaning_reversed: Temporary depression, lack of success, and negativity.

name: Judgement
meaning_reversed: Self-doubt, refusal of self-examination, and ignoring a calling.

name: The World
meaning_reversed: Delays, lack of completion, and short-cuts.

name: Ace of Wands
meaning_reversed: Delays, lack of direction, and missed opportunities.

name: Two of Wands
meaning_reversed: Fear of unknown, lack of planning, and overanalyzing.

name: Three of Wands
meaning_reversed: Delays, obstacles, and limited foresight.

name: Four of Wands
meaning_reversed: Lack of support, home conflicts, and transitions.

name: Five of Wands
meaning_reversed: Avoiding conflict, compromise, and harmony.

name: Six of Wands
meaning_reversed: Egotism, lack of confidence, and fall from grace.

name: Seven of Wands
meaning_reversed: Overwhelmed, giving up, and being overrun.

name: Eight of Wands
meaning_reversed: Delays, frustration, and holding off.

name: Nine of Wands
meaning_reversed: Exhaustion, defensiveness, and paranoia.

name: Ten of Wands
meaning_reversed: Release, delegation, and lightening the load.

name: Page of Wands
meaning_reversed: Lack of direction, procrastination, and conflict.

name: Knight of Wands
meaning_reversed: Recklessness, impulsivity, and lack of focus.

name: Queen of Wands
meaning_reversed: Selfishness, jealousy, and insecurities.

name: King of Wands
meaning_reversed: Impulsiveness, haste, and ruthlessness.

name: Ace of Cups
meaning_upright: Love, new feelings, and emotional awakening.
meaning_reversed: Blocked emotions, emotional loss, and emptiness.

name: Two of Cups
meaning_reversed: Breakup, imbalance, and broken communication.

name: Three of Cups
meaning_reversed: Overindulgence, gossip, and isolation.

name: Four of Cups
meaning_reversed: Seizing opportunities, awareness, and new outlook.

name: Five of Cups
meaning_reversed: Moving on, acceptance, and forgiveness.

name: Six of Cups
meaning_reversed: Living in the past, forgiveness, and moving forward.

name: Seven of Cups
meaning_reversed: Clarity, temptation, and overwhelmed by choices.

name: Eight of Cups
meaning_reversed: Stagnation, fear of moving on, and avoidance.

name: Nine of Cups
meaning_reversed: Dissatisfaction, indulgence, and unfulfilled wishes.

name: Ten of Cups
meaning_reversed: Broken family, disconnection, and misalignment of values.

name: Page of Cups
meaning_reversed: Emotional immaturity, insecurity, and escapism.

name: Knight of Cups
meaning_reversed: Moodiness, disappointment, and jealousy.

name: Queen of Cups
meaning_reversed: Insecurity, dependency, and emotional instability.

name: King of Cups
meaning_reversed: Manipulation, moodiness, and volatility.

name: Ace of Swords
meaning_reversed: Confusion, miscommunication, and chaos.

name: Two of Swords
meaning_reversed: Lesser of two evils, no right choice, and confusion.

name: Three of Swords
meaning_reversed: Recovery, forgiveness, and moving on.

name: Four of Swords
meaning_reversed: Burnout, restlessness, and stress.

name: Five of Swords
meaning_reversed: Reconciliation, making amends, and past resentment.

name: Six of Swords
meaning_upright: Transition, change, and rite of passage.
meaning_reversed: Resistance to change, unfinished business, and carrying baggage.

name: Seven of Swords
meaning_reversed: Impostor syndrome, self-deceit, and getting caught.

name: Eight of Swords
meaning_reversed: Open to new perspectives, freedom, and self-acceptance.

name: Nine of Swords
meaning_reversed: Inner turmoil, secrets, and releasing worry.

name: Ten of Swords
meaning_reversed: Recovery, regeneration, and resisting an inevitable end.

name: Page of Swords
meaning_reversed: Deception, manipulation, and all talk.

name: Knight of Swords
meaning_reversed: Restlessness, impulsiveness, and burnout.

name: Queen of Swords
meaning_reversed: Cold-heartedness, cruelty, and bitterness.

name: King of Swords
meaning_reversed: Manipulation, tyranny, and misuse of power.

name: Ace of Pentacles
meaning_upright: New financial or career opportunities, manifestation, and prosperity.
meaning_reversed: Lost opportunity, lack of planning and foresight.

name: Two of Pentacles
meaning_reversed: Disorganization, financial disarray, and overwhelmed.

name: Three of Pentacles
meaning_reversed: Lack of teamwork, disregard for skills, and disharmony.

name: Four of Pentacles
meaning_reversed: Greed, materialism, and self-protection.

name: Five of Pentacles
meaning_reversed: Recovery, charity, and spiritual poverty.

name: Six of Pentacles
meaning_reversed: Selfishness, debt, and one-sided charity.

name: Seven of Pentacles
meaning_reversed: Lack of vision, limited success, and rewards.

name: Eight of Pentacles
meaning_reversed: Lack of focus, underqualified, and lack of ambition.

name: Nine of Pentacles
meaning_reversed: Overindulgence, financial setbacks, and dependence.

name: Ten of Pentacles
meaning_reversed: Financial failure, family disputes, and instability.

name: Page of Pentacles
meaning_upright: Manifestation, financial opportunity, and new job.
meaning_reversed: Lack of progress, procrastination, and learn from failure.

name: Knight of Pentacles
meaning_reversed: Self-discipline, boredom, and feeling stuck.

name: Queen of Pentacles
meaning_reversed: Self-care, work-home conflict, and financial independence.

name: King of Pentacles
meaning_reversed: Financially inept, obsessed with wealth, and stubborn.
